name: Bull Hellsing
description:
Play as a harsh undead hunter and survive in the dark forest. Hunt during the day and defend against monsters at night, upgrade Bull and buy him new weapons and items. How to play:
  • Movement: W A S D
  • J - Attack
  • K - Use Item
  • L - Dash
  • Space - Buy item \ take quest from the NPC
In the day you need to kill animals to get the resources you need to upgrade Bull In the night you kill undead to buy new weapons and items All items that you purchased previously you can find at Bull's house You can take quests from NPCs that are in buildings Gameplay Video: Follow us on twitter! https://twitter.com/Zander__Games
